original_text: They had a few small fish as well; he gave thanks for them also and told the disciples to distribute them.
korean_text: 또 작은 생선 두어 마리가 있는지라 이에 축복하시고 명하사 이것도 나누어 주게 하시니

sentences.original_text: They had a few small fish as well
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 몇 마리의 작은 생선도 가지고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: he gave thanks for them also
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것들에 대해서도 감사 기도를 드렸습니다

sentences.original_text: and told the disciples to distribute them
